ca.thurn.jgail.ingenious

Class IngeniousHex

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.thurn.jgail.ingenious.IngeniousHex

  • public class IngeniousHex
extends java.lang.Object
    A specific colored hex on the board of Ingenious (or a special value called OFF_BOARD).
